title: Ticket #3342: DAGMan doc for DAGMAN_MAX_JOBS_IDLE found wanting
description: A conversation on #distcomp on 27 November 2012 found the documentation deficient and confusing.
remarks:
2012-Nov-28 11:51:06 by wenger:
Ah, yeah, describing this feature clearly has always been kind of a problem. I think that, whatever language we come up with, we need to run it past a few test subjects to see if they can understand it...

2012-Nov-28 12:07:09 by nwp:
I ran the language past Ian Chesal before pushing it...

2012-Nov-28 12:09:03 by ichesal:
I ran the language past Ian Chesal before pushing it...

Yup. Reads much better now. I understand how it works. :)
check_ins:
2012-Dec-17 10:26   Check-in [34409]: edits to clarification of -maxidle and friends in DAGMan ===GT=== #3342 (By Karen Miller )
2012-Nov-28 12:03   Check-in [34199]: Improve DAGMAN_MAX_JOBS_IDLE documentation #3342 Try to eliminate ambiguity described in following abridged conversation from #distcomp on 27 November 2012: [...] (By Nathan W. Panike )
creator: nwp
